testcase.name: Verify Employee Details Added successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User launch chrome browser............................................passed When user opens url.........................................................passed And user enters username as "Admin" and password as "admin123"..............passed And click on Login button...................................................passed Then After logging in, mouse hover to PIM and click.........................passed And In the PIM page, click on Add Employee..................................passed And Add employees using Data Driven Testing from a csv sheet................passed And After Adding go to the Employee List page...............................passed Then Scroll and look for the employees added and verify with name...........passed Then Logout from the dashboard..............................................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
